content: Hello everyone!I will be updating this page with resouces for Session #0.SoftwareIdeally, I would like to use a mix of Tabletop Simulator for a virtual tabletop and dndbeyond to manage character sheets. You may use whatever tools you best see fit, but I wanted to provide these two since these are the two I will be using.Tabletop Simulator mod packTo increase load times in Tabletop Simulator, I suggest grabbing the mods below. These are the mods that I will be using on the table, so having them downloaded locally will help to prevent you from needing them to be downlaoded upon connecting.This still needs to be aggregated
